entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:33 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:33 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:33 PM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
